casebody.head_matter:
580 A.2d 313
Howard L. DUER and Katherine T. Duer, his wife; Neil R. Anderson and Jaleen L. Anderson, his wife; David V. McClean and Janet A. McClean, his wife; Stephen E. Trybus and Beverly A. 1990.
Decided Oct. 16, 1990.

James C. Tosh, Reed, Luce, Good, Tosh & McGregor, Beaver, for appellees.
Before NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
